reviews.review: Очень неожиданная сюжетная линия то есть сначало мы пытались убить керл но потом она оказалась нашим другом... Спасибо разработчикам не было ни одного бага офигенная игра советую

断断续续玩了很久，终于玩完了
因为全程没看攻略，所以有时候遇到想不明白的关卡就要完好久，不过最终解决的时候确实觉得关卡设计很有趣而且感受到了一种成就感，哈哈哈哈。
最重要的，传送门2的剧情真的是，里面的几个角色的形象真的深入人心（在底层的时候，柠檬那段，真的，人物活过来了），几个反转也是，精彩！最后结局真是太妙了哈哈哈哈哈
推荐，很有趣的游戏
Both Portal games are great, for price they go on sales you really should get one and pass it, if you're thinking about buying it - do it.

Portal 2 is a fun Puzzle game with cool game mechanics and it even lets players make their own Test  Chambers so the game doesn`t end when you complete the story ends. i definently think you should get it.

Truly a great game. Even after you finish it, you can try to speedrun the puzzles or play chambers made from other people in the workshop.

I really loved the game. THE TESTS, CHARACTERS, AND THE PLOT IS A DIAMOND. I am so glad that I bought the game in bundle. I originally planned to buy the Portal 1 only.  

I love how GLaDOS was soooo passive aggressive during the tests. Chell falls under the neutral good... but the chaos. THE CHAOS she left behind was devastating to the aperture facility. LOL.

Yorumlara bakınca abartılıyor falan sandım ama hikayesi bulmacaları falan baya eğlenceli. Tabii bazı bulmacaları zor geldi bana onları yaparken beynim yandı :D Neyse zaten indirimdeyken fiyatıda çok uygun 3.70 TL kesinlikle almanızı öneririm.
Absolute timeless masterpiece that adds so much more to the already amazing Portal 1

I'm making a note here—huge success.

If you like puzzle or story games, this is a worthwhile purchase. The robots are a welcome accompaniment, the game is definitely better with them than without. You don't need to have played the first one to enjoy the story in this one. The puzzles are even more challenging than the first game, and the visuals and storytelling are a definite step up. If you're stuck then you probably need to take a short break. yea

И хочу сказать что очень крутой запутанный 
Сюжет , так ещё и графика неплохая.
Поэтому рекомендую.
Probably the most well designed game I have every played, even in comparison to Fallout New Vegas.
Если жизнь дарит тебе лимон, проси соль и текилу

포탈만큼 참신한 플레이방식을 가진 게임이 과연 얼마나 있을까?
그러한 의문이 절로 들 정로도 포탈은 그 참신함으로 플레이어를 자극하는 게임이다.
갈수록 어려워지는 과제 속에서도 되려 재미를 느낀 건 역시 그 자극의 영향이 컸으리라 본다.

심지어 포탈 2는 1편과 달리 제대로 된 세계관과 스토리가 존재한다.
때문에 1편처럼 지루함을 느낄 겨를도 없이, 그저 내용에 대한 호기심만으로 끝까지 달릴 수 있었다.
현실적인 그래픽으로 인한 현실감은 덤. 벨브만의 세계관이 펼쳐지는 게 눈에 보였다.

단순히 보면 '탈출을 위한 과제 해결'로 요약할 수 있으나, 포탈 2는 결코 거기서 끝나지 않는다.
그러지 않고서야 머리 쓰는 걸 요구하는 게임이 이토록 인기를 얻을 리 없지 않겠는가.
포탈 2를 통해 '재미있는 게임 = 많은 콘텐츠를 담은 게임'은 아니라는 걸 다시 한 번 깨달았다.

Portal 2 is one of the greatest games I have ever played. The story is quite engaging, and the puzzles can test the mind at some times. The multiplayer is so much fun to play with friends. I find this game very re playable, and quite fun to trophy hunt. I will say though, the game isn't very long, but that isn't much of a problem to me. If you are the type of person who likes puzzle, or story games, then this is the game for you.
biraz beyin gerektiriyor ama çok iyi oyun
Great story and plot, and is even better with a friend!
Challenging 3D/moving puzzles with irreverant humor.  A great sequel to the original.
